Module kivakit.data.compression
Package com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs

Interface CharacterCodec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Codec<java.lang.String>, StringCodec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HuffmanCharacterCodec
    public interface CharacterCodec
extends StringCodec
    A character codec compresses strings one character at a time, assigning shorter bit sequences to more frequent characters and longer bit sequences to less frequent characters.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    HuffmanCodec, Codec, StringCodec

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.Codec

        canEncode, decode, encode

      • Methods inherited from interface com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.StringCodec

        train, train
